comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: The Columbia 'Varsity 8 training for the annual Intercollegiate Rowing Association Championship Regatta, at Poughkeepsie, NY, on June 21, 1913. Gathered along the banks of the Hudson River hundreds of Columbia supporters would watch their close bid for the Varsity Challenge Cup slip away after leading the race at the start, as the light blue fell into fifth place. —New York Times
